singleItemContent: Do you like the morning or evening?
What do you usually do in the evening?
What do you do in the evening when you wee little? Why?
Are there any differences between what you do in the evening now and what you did in the past?
Describe an occasion when someone gave you positive advice or suggestion aboutyour work
And explain how you felt about the advice/suggestions
When should parents encourage their children?
Should parents always encourage their children?
Do you think negative feedbacks are more important than positive feedbacks?why?
Why are negative feedbacks as important as positive feedbacks at work?
